alert.note: Alert for Kent; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 8:07PM EDT until August 24 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kent County in southwestern Michigan... Northeastern Ottawa County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 807 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sparta to near Coopersville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Wyoming... Kentwood... Walker... Grandville... East Grand Rapids... Rockford... Coopersville... Sparta... Lowell... Gerald R. Ford Inter... Allendale... Ada... Grattan... Conklin... Wright... Kent City... Wells Airport... Lamont... Belmont... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
